name: Kathy's Southern Corn Pudding
author: Jacquita
summary: This is a wonderful side dish that goes great with ham or pork.  It's wonderful for that big crowd at Thanksgiving and Christmas, and very quick and easy to make.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 9x13 baking dish; set aside
Beat eggs until fluffy in a large bowl
Stirring constantly, pour in melted margarine
Stir in sugar, whole kernel corn, and cream-style corn until well combined
Dissolve the cornstarch in the milk; combine with the corn mixture
Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until the pudding is puffed and golden, and a knife inserted into the center comes out clean; about 1 1/2 hours
